thread.section_title: Hotel Del Corso - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In the heart of Rome
thread.title_full: In the heart of Rome - Review of Hotel Del Corso, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Vladimíra Š
title: In the heart of Rome
text: This hotel is located exactly in the heart of Rome. You can reach all main monuments as well as restaurants and shopping sites in few minutes from this hotel. Rooms are small but comfortable. Incredible great breakfast on the rooftop with fantastic view and fantastic capuccino! Friendly and helpful staff.
